ticket_summary: Customer reports missing or delayed baggage from Flight AL1013 on July 19, 2024.
email_subject: Missing/Delayed Baggage – Flight AL1013 on July 19, 2024
email_body:
Dear Customer Service,

I am writing to express my concern regarding my baggage that was not available upon my arrival on Flight AL1013 on July 19, 2024. I waited for a long time at the baggage claim area, but my bag was never delivered. This situation has caused me significant inconvenience as I need my belongings for my onward journey.

Please provide me with an update on the status of my baggage and the steps you will take to resolve this issue.

Thank you.

Best regards,
Arvind Vivekanandan
